config_description: /** * Database setting OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES (default: true). * Optimize expressions of the form (SELECT A) to A. */
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES is used to optimize expressions of the form (SELECT A) to A in the code. When the session's database setting optimizeSimpleSingleRowSubqueries is true, the optimization is triggered.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the optimizeSimpleSingleRowSubqueries setting is true in the session's database settings.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES configuration option is that it improves the performance of the system by optimizing single row subqueries, reducing the complexity of the queries and potentially improving query execution time.
